sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>neck</radical> and the kanji <kanji>neck</kanji> are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: The only thing you do with your <kanji>neck</kanji> is use it to swallow lots of <reading>coo</reading>l <reading>bea</reading>ns (<ja>くび</ja>). Mm mm. Feel those cool, cool beans sliding down your neck. You don't really taste them, but you know they're there.
readingInfo: Look at yourself in a mirror as the cool beans make their way down your neck. You can see them, like little ants marching all the way down to your tummy.
